data.name: VolunteerRequestModel_ComposeMessage_Body
data.value:
Hi {first},

We need additional volunteers for {org}
on {meetingdate} at {meetingtime}

DO NOT REPLY. Instead, click one of the links below.

{yeslink}

{nolink}

Thank you for your consideration,
{sendername}

data.name: VolSubModel_ComposeMessage_Body
data.value:
Hi {first},

I need a substitute for {org}
on {meetingdate} at {meetingtime}

DO NOT REPLY. Instead, click one of the links below.

{yeslink}

{nolink}

Thank you for your consideration,
{sendername}

data.name: AccountModel_ForgotPasswordReset
data.value:
Someone recently requested a new password for this email address {email}. To set your password, click the link below:

New Password

If this is a mistake, please disregard this message, your password will not be changed.

Thanks,
The BVCMS Team

data.name: AccountModel_ForgotPasswordBadEmail
data.value:
Someone recently requested a new password for this email address {email}. However, we could not find an account associated with this email address. You may try a different email address, or contact the church.

If this is a mistake, please disregard this message, your password will not be changed.

Thanks,
The BVCMS Team

data.name: AccountModel_ForgotPasswordReset2
data.value:
Someone recently requested a new password for {email}. To set your password, click your username below:

{resetlink}

If this is a mistake, please disregard this message, your password will not be changed.

Thanks,
The BVCMS Team

data.name: AccountModel_NewUserWelcome
data.value:
Hi {name},

You have a new account on our Church Management System. Click on your username below to set your password and login to the system.

Your username is: {username}

data.name: ContributionStatementHeader
data.value:
Sample Church

2000 Appling Rd. | Cordova | TN 38088-1210 | (901) 347-2000

data.name: ContributionStatementNotice
data.value:
NOTE: No goods or services were provided to you by the church in connection with any contibution; any value received consisted entirely of intangible religious benefits. Sample Church, FEIN # 1234, is a 501(c)(3) organization and qualifies as a part of the Southern Baptist Convention's group tax exemption ruling number GEN #1674.

Thank you for your faithfulness in the giving of your time, talents, and resources. Together we can share the love of Jesus with our city.

data.name: OrgMembersModel_SendMovedNotices
data.value:
{name},

You have been assigned to {org} in room {room}. The leader's name is {leader}.

Please call {phone} if you have any questions.

Please print this and bring it with you as a reminder of your room number.

Thank you!
{church}

data.name: DiffEmailMessage
data.value:
Hi {name},

You registered for {org} using a different email address than the one we have on record. It is important that you call the church {phone} to update our records so that you will receive future important notices regarding this registration.

data.name: NoEmailMessage
data.value:
Hi {name},

You registered for {org}, and we found your record, but there was no email address on your Existing record in our database. If you would like for us to update your record with this email address or another, Please contact the church at {phone} to let us know. It is important that we have your email address so that you will receive future important notices regarding this registration. But we won't add that to your record without your permission. Thank you

data.name: AccountController_ForgotUsername
data.value:
Hi {name},

Your username is: {username}

If you did not request this, please disregard this message.

Thanks,
The bvCMS Team

data.name: CreateAccount_ExistingUser
data.value:
Hi {name},

We noticed you already have an account in our church database.

You can login at {host}. And if you can't remember your password or username, click the Forgot Password link when you get there. Note: you will need to know your username for this to work. If you do not know your username, then please click forgot username first. This will send you a link you can use to reset your password.

You can use your account to help us maintain your correct address, email and phone numbers. Just login to {host} and you will be taken to your record where you can make corrections if needed.

Thank You

data.name: NotifyDuplicateUserOnMobile
data.value:
Hi {name},

It appears that you created a user account from your mobile device. We found your existing record but you used this email address '{otheremail}' which is not the one we have your record. We went ahead and created a new account for you. However, it is a separate one from your existing account. You should have also received a welcome message for that new account.

It is important that you contact the church at {churchphone} to update your records so that your data will not stay duplicated.

{church}

data.name: ContributionsController_ContributionsAdvancedSearch_
data.value:
with ids as ( select * from dbo.Contributions2SearchIds(@json) ) select p.FamilyId, p.PeopleId, c.ContributionDate as [Date],
case when fa.HeadOfHouseholdId = sp.PeopleId and isnull(sp.ContributionOptionsId, case when mssp.Married = 1 then 2 else 1 end) = 2 and isnull(p.ContributionOptionsId, case when msp.Married = 1 then 2 else 1 end) = 2 then sp.PeopleId else c.PeopleId end as CreditGiverId,
case when isnull(sp.ContributionOptionsId, case when mssp.Married = 1 then 2 else 1 end) = 1 or isnull(p.ContributionOptionsId, case when msp.Married = 1 then 2 else 1 end) = 1 then null when fa.HeadOfHouseholdId = sp.PeopleId then c.PeopleId else sp.PeopleId end as CreditGiverId2,
case when fa.HeadOfHouseholdId = sp.PeopleId then p.PeopleId else sp.PeopleId end as SpouseId,
case when fa.HeadOfHouseholdId = sp.PeopleId then sp.Name2 else p.Name2 end as HeadName,
case when fa.HeadOfHouseholdId = sp.PeopleId then p.Name2 else sp.Name2 end as SpouseName,
case when c.ContributionTypeId != 8 then c.ContributionAmount else 0 end as Amount,
case when c.ContributionTypeId = 8 then c.ContributionAmount else 0 end as PledgeAmount,
h.BundleHeaderId, c.ContributionDesc, c.CheckNo, c.FundId, f.FundName, bht.[Description] as BundleType, c.ContributionId, c.[Source], c.MetaInfo, t.[Description] TransactionDesc, c.ContributionTypeId, ca.[Description] Campus from dbo.Contribution c join ids on ids.ContributionId = c.ContributionId join dbo.ContributionFund f on c.FundId = f.FundId join dbo.BundleDetail d on c.ContributionId = d.ContributionId join dbo.BundleHeader h on d.BundleHeaderId = h.BundleHeaderId join lookup.BundleHeaderTypes bht on h.BundleHeaderTypeId = bht.Id join lookup.BundleStatusTypes bst on h.BundleStatusId = bst.Id join dbo.People p on c.PeopleId = p.PeopleId join dbo.Families fa on p.FamilyId = fa.FamilyId left join dbo.People sp on sp.PeopleId = p.SpouseId left join lookup.MaritalStatus mssp on mssp.Id = sp.MaritalStatusId left join lookup.MaritalStatus msp on msp.Id = p.MaritalStatusId left outer join dbo.[Transaction] t on t.Id = c.TranId left outer join lookup.Campus ca on ca.Id = c.CampusId
